name: Agent Message Envelope
description: A baseline messaging protocol for agent-to-agent requests, responses, and event streams with typed payload envelopes.

name: Capability Discovery Index
description: Defines how agents publish and discover tool, memory, and model capabilities across local and remote registries.

name: Mutual Agent Auth
description: Mutual authentication and signed challenge flow for establishing trusted channels between autonomous agents.

name: Portable Agent Records
description: A normalized data interchange format for profile, memory pointers, and execution context snapshots.

name: Session Handshake v2
description: Negotiates protocol versioning, transport preferences, and safety capabilities before message exchange.

name: Federated Agent Registry
description: A draft discovery protocol for cross-organization agent index sync and reputation metadata exchange.

name: Delegation Token Flow
description: Short-lived delegation credentials allowing scoped, auditable execution on behalf of a parent agent.

name: Context Bundles
description: Legacy protocol for packaging multi-part context artifacts; superseded by Portable Agent Records.
